content: work row 1 ws slip 1 stitch with yarn in front p1 repeat to end row 2 rs slip 1 stitch knit to end repeat row 1&2 a total of 18 20 24 times for a total of 36 40 48 row worked heel turn aka sock magic row 1 ws slip 1 stitch p to 11 13 15 stitches to end p2tog p1 turn work leaving 8 10 12 stitches on the left needle row 2 rs slip 1 stitch k to 11 13 15 stitches to end ssk k1 turn work leaving 8 10 12 stitches on left needle row 3 ws slip 1 stitch p to one stitch before previous decreased stitch p2tog p1 turn work there will be 2 stitches less than the previous ws row that will remain on the left needle row 4 rs slip 1 stitch k to one stitch before previous decreased stitch ssk k1 turn work there will be 2 stitches less than the previous rs row that will remain on the left needle repeat row 3 & 4 until there are no stitches remaining on the left needle ending the last two row with a k2tog and p2tog if necessary 18 20 22 stitches remain pick up for gusset pick up and knit 18 20 24 stitches along left edge of heel flap this should work out to be one stitch in each slipped stitch on the heel flap edge place marker knit across 28 32 36 top of foot instep stitches place marker pick up and knit 18 20 24 stitches on the second side of the heel flap if working with dpns knit across half 9 10 12 stitches of the remaining heel stitches on to the needle you just picked up the second side of heel gusset slip remaining heel stitches onto the needle with the other gusset stitches you will have your stitches separated on 3 needles again and the middle of the heel with now be the beginning of the round if working on magic loop keep front 28 32 36 stitches on one needles and all heel and gusset stitches on needle 2 there should be 82 92 106 stitches total gusset decreases row 1 knit to 3 stitches before marker or end of needle 2 on magic loop k2tog k1 sm knit across 28 32 36 front stitches sm k1 ssk knit to end 2 stitches decreased row 2 knit all stitches repeat row 1 & 2 until you have 56 64 72 stitches 2 afterthought heel the after thought heel is a great heel for self striping yarn if you don t care for knitting a heel flap and all those gusset
